GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.15.25
GSD.description:
libsubcmd: Fix use-after-free for realloc(..., 0)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.25 by commit f8ba235c4927b5f970c868ac101ec42ca16c183a, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit 2f4ce5ec1d447beb42143a9653716a2ab025161e. For more details please see the references link.
